synopsis.text: The anime centers around Shinra Kishitani and Celty Sturluson, a couple living in the chaotic city of Ikebukuro. Despite the mayhem around them, they decide to take a short romantic trip together. Shinra is thrilled to finally spend quality time with his beloved Celty and tries his best to give her his full attention, even declining calls from his friend Izaya Orihara. However, Ikebukuro's eccentric residents persist in trying to contact Shinra during his holiday. Furthermore, as Shinra and Celty reminisce while riding in a carriage, Celty senses an ominous presence. This extra episode depicts the shocking incident that transpires during their trip, interrupting their idyllic getaway. Adapted from the popular seventh volume of the original light novel series, this special episode promises to showcase the couple's unbreakable bond amidst unexpected chaos. Though their vacation takes a dramatic turn, Shinra and Celty's devotion to one another is sure to prevail.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
